Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the [DataBoundControl.CreatingModelDataSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh737637\(v=vs.110\)) and [Repeater.CreatingModelDataSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh737645\(v=vs.110\)) events.
